1.Pros: Since minimum wage went up working at McDonalds part time helped me to save money and it was simple

2.Cons: Low pay, high stress/fast paced, few breaks

8.Pros: It is a good place to start off at, definitely not a career. It helps build customer service skills which is beneficial for other jobs down the road

9.Cons: Work life balance is a challenge
